column2: Tbl3_rep <- apply(df_orig_complete[,c("stdliv_past5_di_1","stdliv_past5_di_2","stdliv_next5_di_1","stdliv_next5_di_2","noway_future_improve","mkt_econ_eval_di_1","mkt_econ_eval_di_2")], 2, function(x) {sapply(split(data.frame(df_orig_complete[,"weight"], x), df_orig_complete$group), function(y) mean(y[,2], w = y$weight))})
